title: Drawing, "Design for a Chest of Drawers", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Chest with six drawers decorated in marquetry inlay of stylized flowers between scallops. Similar decorations on piers and cornice. A metal gallery between finials above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Chest of Drawers", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-477.
